content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction setup at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace (position y1)

### Iron gear wheel crafting setup
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to furnace inventory inspection
- Verify the furnace inventory before extraction to ensure it contains the expected items.
